title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: download, build and run LLMs locally with a single command-line tool.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and async helpers for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings provider.

title: Ollama on Hugging Face
summary: Hugging Face organization page listing GGUF models officially bundled for Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with user auth, RAG and plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API, streaming and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic client for Ollama with streaming and model commands.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat component that plugs into any Ollama backend with streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package definition for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples for CPU and GPU setups with persistent volumes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET wrapper for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection and minimal API examples.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed client for Ollama with Tokio async and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints and admin UI that exposes Ollama models to web clients.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + LangChain for PDF Q&A.
